title: Chapter 1241 - Killing As If Out For A Casual Stroll
body:
Chapter 1241 - Killing As If Out For A Casual Stroll

The atmosphere was stifled and oppressive. Throughout the surrounding area, no one spoke.

The crowd’s hearts had completely given in to fright.

The World Kings looked at each other, then joined forces without the slightest hesitation.

Boom!

The earth swayed and the heavens shook.

All manner of treasures soared into the firmament, bringing with them dazzling divine flames.

Countless astonishing secret arts exploded into being, bearing down and collapsing the skies.

Their stinging, dazzling radiance illuminated the formerly ink-dark skies.

A group of World Kings were attacking together. How could their power possibly be ordinary?

In the blink of an eye, a calamitous vision unfolded. The crowd felt as if they were witnessing the apocalypse, and their hearts filled with terror.

And all of this was targeted at Su Yi.

Su Yi’s expression didn’t so much as waver.

He took a step forward, and…

Boom!

The soft, gentle sound of his footsteps reverberated through the air like thunder.

Heaven and earth were tumultuous and explosive, yet now, it was as if a massive hand had restricted them. The rampaging divine flames and resplendent, imposing treasure lights, the startling destructive energy fluctuations of secret arts…

All of them abruptly...
original_title: Chapter 1241 - Killing as if Out for a Casual Stroll
